advice.label: Advice #001
advice.content: Track your income and expenses to understand your spending habits.

advice.label: Advice #005
advice.content: Define short-term and long-term financial objectives and create a plan to achieve them.

advice.label: Advice #006
advice.content: Regularly check and work to improve your credit rating.

advice.label: Advice #007
advice.content: Spend less than you earn and avoid lifestyle inflation.

advice.label: Advice #010
advice.content: Regularly revisit and modify your budget to reflect changes in your financial situation.
